basics.name: Chris Johnson
basics.label: Front End Developer
basics.summary: Completely devoted to development, enriching myself with new languages and better, more efficient coding practices. I have worked primarily as a front end developer and a design manager thus far in my career and look to expand into full stack development. I have an excellent mix of technical skill and customer service abilities and can fill any position from the ground up. Tenacious, driven and above all fun-loving.

work.summary: Developing and maintaining an Android hybrid app built on Backbonejs and cordova which controls Wemo smart home devices
highlights: Wrote prototypes based on UI specs
Assisted in improvement efforts to increase the apps modularity and make better use of backbone, sass and handlebars
Presented weekly demonstrations on additions or improvments to the team
Participated in brainstorming sessions with UI/UX design team on user flows

work.summary: I directed and oversaw the Homes.com Studio design department to provide quality web design and content products. My duties were to ensure product standards were being met, customer satisfaction, managerial duties, and to develop new creative ways to extend our product line and provide additional options for clients to enhance their marketing materials.
highlights: Refactored design process to implement LESS, Responsive design, and better javascript practices
Hired and trained web designers and customer service consultants
Took customer calls and provided support when needed
Generated progress and revenue reports for upper management

work.summary: My duties included work in the Adobe creative suite such as photo editing, illustration, or web design. Also I wrote HTML and CSS based websites with some use of PHP and jQuery.
highlights: Often worked on several different clients per day
Converted PSD mockups into pixel-perfect Websites
Edited large volumes of photos for retail clients
Photo retouch and editing on landscape, portrait, and action photography

education.area: Mass Media Communication and Information Science
